email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re offering is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the freight rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $50.00 per metric ton. As for the laycan, we’re looking at October 20-25 for loading. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 sounds more reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. The laycan dates are acceptable. Could you also provide details on the demurrage terms? Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Great to hear that the rate and laycan work for you. The demurrage rate is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement for your review shortly. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Everything looks good on our end. Please go ahead and send the charter party agreement. We’ll review and get back to you with any comments. Thanks for your assistance. Cheers, John
